product_name: Theo Chocolate World Bicycle Relief Sea Salt Dark Chocolate Bar - 3 oz.
long_description: The Theo Chocolate World Bicycle Relief Sea Salt Dark Chocolate bar combines 70% dark chocolate with a pinch of sea salt for a tasty treat you can enjoy anytime. Proceeds from the sale of this chocolate bar will help provide students, health care workers and entrepreneurs in rural Africa with World Bicycle Relief (WBR) bicycles. With over 100,000 bicycles in the field and 750 field mechanics trained, WBR is changing lives across Africa by providing reliable transportation. Theo Chocolate World Bicycle Relief Sea Salt Dark Chocolate bar is Fair Trade Certified(TM) and USDA organic. Nutrition facts displayed here and on packaging may differ; information on packaging reflects actual contents. *Discount will be applied when you check out; offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
